mapper.insert: insert into bas_equ_info (equ_id, station_id, equ_name, equ_name_EN, equ_no, specification, company_code, project_code, kks_code, equ_category_big, equ_category_small, manufacture_date, amount, unit, protect_level, belongsystem, sp_id, files_id, gateway_id, device_no, equ_grad, equ_status, equ_desc) values (#{equId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kksCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equCategoryBig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equCategorySmall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manufactureDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protectLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belongsystem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gatewayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equGrad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bas_equ_info set station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equ_name = #{equName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equ_name_EN = #{equNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equ_no = #{equNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_code = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kks_code = #{kksCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equ_category_big = #{equCategoryBig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equ_category_small = #{equCategorySmall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manufacture_date = #{manufactureDate,jdbcType=DATE}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, protect_level = #{protectLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, belongsystem = #{belongsystem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sp_id = #{spId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, files_id = #{filesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gateway_id = #{gatewayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equ_grad = #{equGrad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equ_status = #{equStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equ_desc = #{equDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where equ_id = #{equId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select equ_id, station_id, equ_name, equ_name_EN, equ_no, specification, company_code, project_code, kks_code, equ_category_big, equ_category_small, manufacture_date, amount, unit, protect_level, belongsystem, sp_id, files_id, gateway_id, device_no, equ_grad, equ_status, equ_desc from bas_equ_info where equ_id = #{equId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select equ_id, station_id, equ_name, equ_name_EN, equ_no, specification, company_code, project_code, kks_code, equ_category_big, equ_category_small, manufacture_date, amount, unit, protect_level, belongsystem, sp_id, files_id, gateway_id, device_no, equ_grad, equ_status, equ_desc from bas_equ_info WHERE station_id=#{station_id} and equ_category_big=#{equ_category_big}
